## FeatureDataSourceOptions.features property

Initial set of features for new instance of \[\[FeaturesDataSource\]\].

Shortcut for calling \[\[FeaturesDataSource.add\]\] after construction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
features?: MapViewFeature[];
```
